publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3403 Ms Rosemary Byrne: General Teaching Council Lecture Presented by Baroness Warnockâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the General Teaching Council and Baroness Warnock for the thought-provoking lecture on 5 October 2005 on the issue of inclusion; recognises that this is an issue of concern for teachers and parents alike, and calls on the Executive to initiate an immediate review of the policy of inclusion in the education system, including resourcing.
